board	N	2-2	Room and board .	He nailed boards across the windows .
circulate	V	0-4	Circulate a rumor .	This letter is being circulated among the faculty .
hook	V	0-1	Hook a fish .	He hooked a snake accidentally , and was so scared he dropped his rod into the water .
recreation	N	1-9	For recreation he wrote poetry and solved crossword puzzles .	Drug abuse is often regarded as a form of recreation .
domesticity	N	4-6	Making a hobby of domesticity .	A royal family living in unpretentious domesticity .
